title: Holiday Gathering with Medill Faculty and Alumni in NYC
desc:
The Medill Club of NY and Medill Alumni Relations invite you to a holiday gathering with special guests Professor Craig Duff and Assistant Professor Brent Huffman. The faculty will present short films from Medill?s recent student trips to Pakistan and Uganda. Kate Lee, Medill's assistant director for external programs, will discuss the dean's new Global Experiences initiative and the 2016 upcoming student trips. 
 7 p.m. ? 8 p.m. Cocktail Reception 
 8 p.m. ? 9 p.m. Presentation and Q and A 
 RSVP Required as seats are limited. 
 Drinks and appetizers will be provided courtesy of Medill Alumni Relations
